fields.desc_footer: There are several tables pressed up against the walls. There are many books         that have been left negligently around the room that are wormeaten         and moldy. There's a wooden box on one of the tables.
fields.title: A study
Dark
fields.desc_header: It's completely dark. You can't see a     thing apart from the door you just came from, not even the walls.

fields.desc_footer: You look around the room and notice the door to the East.
fields.title: Attic
fields.desc_header: You wake up in a dimly lit room, not entirely sure where you are         or how you got there. The paint on the walls is cracked and peeling,         yellowed stains stretching from the ceiling to the floor.         The curtains hang tattered, light from the sunset casting shadows across the floor.

fields.desc_footer: You cast your gaze around the room and         take note of the four doors. The West door has a set of stairs beyond         and leads to the attic. There are three other doors, one to the North,         one to the South and one to the East.
fields.title: Second floor
fields.desc_header: You walk down the stairs and         into the next room.

fields.short_desc: There is a window to the South.
fields.examine: The window faces         South. It's dirty and cracked, but you can look through it easily enough.         The sun is setting over the forest below.

fields.short_desc: There's a painting on the North wall.
fields.examine: The         painting hangs crookedly and is extremely ugly, the colors are mottled         and grotesque. You can't even understand the actual forms on the         canvas. The left side of the frame is a quarter-inch away from the         wall, but the right side is flush with it.

fields.short_desc: There's a painting on the North wall.
fields.examine: The         painting hangs crookedly and is extremely ugly, the colors are mottled         and grotesque. You can't even understand the actual forms on the         canvas. There's a key taped to the back of the painting.

fields.short_desc: There's a lighter on the floor.
a key
There's a key taped to the back of the painting.
There's a desk next to the North door.
fields.examine: The desk has three drawers: one on the left, one on the right,         and one in the very middle. The right drawer is jammed shut.

fields.short_desc: There's a desk next to the North door.
fields.examine: The desk has three drawers. The left drawer is open. The         right drawer is jammed shut.

fields.short_desc: There's a desk next to the North door.
fields.examine: The         desk has three drawers. The middle drawer is open. The right drawer         is jammed shut.

fields.short_desc: There's a desk next to the North door.
fields.examine: The         desk has three drawers. The left drawer and the middle drawer are open.         The right drawer is jammed shut.

fields.short_desc: a red key
There's a red key in the middle drawer.
There's a cabinet in the corner of the room.
fields.examine: A pair of doors is set in the front.

fields.short_desc: There's a cabinet in the corner of the room.
a rusty key
There's a rusty key inside the cabinet.
fields.examine: It looks like it fits that door to the south.

fields.short_desc: A vase full of long-dead flowers sits on top of the cabinet.
fields.examine: There's no water in the vase, and upon picking it up, all the         flowers fall apart.

fields.short_desc: A vase sits on top of the cabinet.
a blue key
Another key, painted blue, was hidden inside the vase.
fields.examine: The East door looks like it might have been blue once.

fields.use_message: You lift the painting away from the wall. There's a key taped to the back.
There's nothing else behind the painting.
There's a spare light bulb in the drawer.
There's another key inside, this one painted red.
There's a spare light bulb in the drawer.
There's another key inside, this one painted red.
A key, this one painted blue, falls out.
The key sticks in the lock and, despite your best efforts,         breaks in half.
